title: Get comments on an owned video

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by TikTok creators. To obtain an access token, use /tt_user/oauth2/token/ .

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok account. Pass the value of the open_id field returned in the response of /tt_user/oauth2/token/ to this field.

parameters.name: video_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for owned TikTok video to list comments (and comment replies) on. This can be accessed via the /business/video/list/ endpoint.

parameters.name: comment_ids
parameters.description: A list of IDs for comments or comment replies that you want to filter the results by. Max size: 30.

parameters.name: include_replies
parameters.description: Whether to include replies to the top-level comments in the results. If you set this field to true , each top-level comment will be returned with their corresponding replies. The maximum number of replies for each comment is three. The returned comments and replies will be sorted by smart sorting algorithm by default. Default value: false . To get all the replies to a comment, use /business/comment/reply/list/ .

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The visibility status of comments (and comment replies) that you want to filter the results by. Enum values : PUBLIC : Comments (and comment replies) that are publicly viewable by all TikTok users. ALL : Video owner's comments (and comment replies) that are both hidden from view as well as publicly viewable by all TikTok users. Default value : ALL

parameters.name: sort_field
parameters.description: Specific field to sort comments (and comment replies) by. Enum values : likes : Sort comments (and comment replies) by the number of likes in the specified sort_order . replies : Sort comments (and comment replies) by the number of replies in the specified sort_order . create_time : Sort comments (and comment replies) chronologically in the specified sort_order . By default, the comments will be returned in a random order. Note : If the number of comments on the owned video exceeds 500, the first 500 comments will be returned according to the specified sorting, and the remaining comments will be returned in reverse order based on the number of likes. Also, the comments beyond the first 500 and the first 500 comments themselves are not deduplicated and may contain duplicates.

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Specific field to sort comments (and comment replies) by. Enum values : asc : Sort comments (and comment replies) in ascending order by the specified sort_field . desc : Sort comments (and comment replies) in descending order by the specified sort_field . smart : Sort comments (and comment replies) using algorithms. Default value: smart

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination. If the response parameter has_more is true , pass the returned cursor in this parameter in the subsequent request to receive the next page of results. Default value : 0

parameters.name: max_count
parameters.description: The maximum number of comments that will be returned for each page of data. Default value : 20 Minimum value : 1 Maximum value : 30 Note : Due to our trust and safety policies, it is possible that the endpoint returns less than the max_count number of comments even if the response parameter has_more is true .

examples.title: Get all comments on an owned video
Get specified comments on an owned video

top_fields.name: Date
top_fields.description: Date and time (GMT) when the response was received. Example: Fri, 13 Aug 2021 08:04:42 GMT.

top_fields.name: X-Tt-Logid
top_fields.description: Unique identifier for the API request.

item_fields.name: request_id
item_fields.description: Unique identifier for the API request. Please record this field for all API requests. Important for issue reports and troubleshooting.

item_fields.name: code
item_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

item_fields.name: message
item_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Information .

item_fields.name: data
item_fields.description: Returned data.

item_fields.name: comments
item_fields.description: List of current page of comments (or comment replies or both) created on the specified video.

item_fields.name: comment_id
item_fields.description: Unique identifier for the comment or comment reply. Example : 6990565363377392901

item_fields.name: video_id
item_fields.description: Unique identifier for the owned video that the comment or comment reply was created on. Example : 6990565363377392901

item_fields.name: user_id To-be-deprecated
item_fields.description: Developer application and TikTok account scoped unique identifier for the user that made the comment or comment reply. Example : ce9b7be629b0447af777a0ad945783f61b7f790982b49fbda04a23b4722eaffe Note : This field will be deprecated in the next API version. We recommend using unique_identifier to identify the TikTok user because the identifier remains consistent across different APIs.

item_fields.name: unique_identifier
item_fields.description: A globally unique identifier assigned to each user commenting. This identifier remains consistent across different APIs, facilitating cross-referencing and integration. Example : +ABc1D2/E0fGhijklMNOrD34vDW/zDiZUNRH5Jyahue6OcA7b8ZpwnqXV9u1Uh+k

item_fields.name: create_time
item_fields.description: Unix/Epoch date-time when the comment or comment reply was created. Example : 1627617835

item_fields.name: text
item_fields.description: Text content of the comment or comment reply. Example : "This is a comment #comment ðŸ™‚"

item_fields.name: likes
item_fields.description: Number of likes the comment or comment reply has received. Example : 123

item_fields.name: replies
item_fields.description: Number of replies the comment has received. Example : 123

item_fields.name: owner
item_fields.description: Whether the user who posted the video made the comment or comment reply. Example : true

item_fields.name: liked
item_fields.description: Whether the user who posted the video has liked the comment or comment reply. Example : true

item_fields.name: pinned
item_fields.description: Whether the user who posted the video has pinned the comment or comment reply. Example : true

item_fields.name: status
item_fields.description: The visibility status of the comment or comment reply. Enum values : HIDDEN : The comment or comment reply is hidden from public viewership. PUBLIC : The comment or comment reply can be viewed by all users. Example : PUBLIC

item_fields.name: username
item_fields.description: The username of the TikTok user who made the comment or comment reply. Example : feather_in_the_w1nd

item_fields.name: display_name
item_fields.description: The display name of the TikTok user who made the comment or comment reply. Example : Feather in the wind

item_fields.name: profile_image
item_fields.description: Temporary URL for profile image of the TikTok user who posted the comment or comment reply. Expiration date-time is included in the x-expires parameter as Epoch/Unix time in seconds. Example : https://p16-sign-va.tiktokcdn.com/tos-maliva-avt-0068/188d468fc1de3f328250ea0c96e98f8b~c5_168x168.jpeg? x-expires =1651687200&x-signature=AAiHg70%2Bnj9iUipTuQWodRmk0qA%3D

item_fields.name: parent_comment_id
item_fields.description: Returned only for comment replies. The ID of the comment to which the reply is directed.

item_fields.name: reply_list
item_fields.description: Returned only for top-level comments when include_replies is set to true . Information about the replies to the comment. Max size: 3.

item_fields.name: video_id
item_fields.description: Unique identifier for the owned video that the comment reply was created on. Example : 6990565363377392901

item_fields.name: comment_id
item_fields.description: Unique identifier for the comment reply. Example : 6990565363377392901

item_fields.name: create_time
item_fields.description: Unix/Epoch date-time when the comment reply was created. Example : 1627617835

item_fields.name: text
item_fields.description: Text content of the comment reply. Example : "This is a comment reply#comment reply ðŸ™‚"

item_fields.name: status
item_fields.description: The visibility status of the comment reply. Enum values: HIDDEN : The comment reply is hidden from public viewership. PUBLIC : The comment reply can be viewed by all users. Example : PUBLIC .

item_fields.name: liked
item_fields.description: Whether this comment reply is liked by the user who posted the video. Example : true

item_fields.name: likes
item_fields.description: Number of likes the comment reply has received. Example : 123

item_fields.name: owner
item_fields.description: Whether the comment reply is made by the user who posted the video. Example : true

item_fields.name: user_id To-be-deprecated
item_fields.description: Developer application and TikTok account scoped unique identifier for the user who made the comment reply. Example : ce9b7be629b0447af777a0ad945783f61b7f790982b49fbda04a23b4722eaffe Note : This field will be deprecated in the next API version. We recommend using unique_identifier to identify the TikTok user because the identifier remains consistent across different APIs.

item_fields.name: unique_identifier
item_fields.description: A globally unique identifier assigned to each user commenting. This identifier remains consistent across different APIs, facilitating cross-referencing and integration. Example : +ABc1D2/E0fGhijklMNOrD34vDW/zDiZUNRH5Jyahue6OcA7b8ZpwnqXV9u1Uh+k

item_fields.name: username
item_fields.description: The username of the TikTok user who posted the comment reply. Example : feather_in_the_w1nd

item_fields.name: display_name
item_fields.description: The display name of the TikTok user who posted the comment reply. Example : Feather in the wind

item_fields.name: profile_image
item_fields.description: Temporary URL for profile image of the TikTok user who posted the comment reply. Expiration date-time is included in the x-expires parameter as Epoch/Unix time in seconds. Example : https://p16-sign-va.tiktokcdn.com/tos-maliva-avt-0068/188d468fc1de3f328250ea0c96e98f8b~c5_168x168.jpeg? x-expires =1651687200&x-signature=AAiHg70%2Bnj9iUipTuQWodRmk0qA%3D

item_fields.name: parent_comment_id
item_fields.description: The ID of the parent comment to which the comment reply is directed.

item_fields.name: cursor
item_fields.description: Cursor for the next page of results, to be passed in the cursor query parameter of the subsequent API request.

item_fields.name: has_more
item_fields.description: Whether an additional page of data is available.

example.body:
{
    "code": 0,
    "message": "OK",
    "request_id": "{{request_id}}",
    "data": {
        "comments": [
            {
                "user_id": "{{user_id}}",
                "unique_identifier": "{{unique_identifier}}",
                "profile_image": "{{profile_image}}",
                "replies": 0,
                "username": "{{username}}",
                "display_name": "{{display_name}}",
                "liked": false,
                "comment_id": "{{comment_id}}",
                "status": "HIDDEN",
                "create_time": "1681790814",
                "pinned": false,
                "likes": 0,
                "owner": true,
                "video_id": "{{video_id}}",
                "text": "{{text}}"
            },
            {
                "user_id": "{{user_id}}",
                "unique_identifier": "{{unique_identifier}}",
                "profile_image": "{{profile_image}}",
                "replies": 0,
                "username": "{{username}}",
                "display_name": "{{display_name}}",
                "liked": false,
                "comment_id": "{{comment_id}}",
                "status": "HIDDEN",
                "create_time": "1681790814",
                "pinned": false,
                "likes": 0,
                "owner": true,
                "video_id": "{{video_id}}",
                "text": "{{text}}"
            },
            {
                "user_id": "{{user_id}}",
                "unique_identifier": "{{unique_identifier}}",
                "profile_image": "{{profile_image}}",
                "replies": 1,
                "username": "{{username}}",
                "display_name": "{{display_name}}",
                "liked": true,
                "comment_id": "{{comment_id}}",
                "status": "PUBLIC",
                "create_time": "{{create_time}}",
                "pinned": false,
                "likes": 1,
                "owner": true,
                "video_id": "{{video_id}}",
                "text": "{{text}}"
            }
        ],
        "has_more": false,
        "cursor": 3
    }
}
